content: संस्थ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Staying, abiding, lasting. {@--2@} Dwelling, being, existing, situated (at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>); शिष्टा क्रिया कस्यचिदात्मसंस्था <ls>M. 1. 16</ls>; <ls>Ku. 6. 60</ls>; निसर्गमिन्नास्पदमेकसंस्थं <ls>R. 6. 29</ls>; <ls>Māl. 5. 16.</ls> {@--3@} Tame, domesticated. {@--4@} Fixed, stationary. {@--5@} Ended, perished, dead. {@--6@} Come to an end, completed. {@--7@} Manifested (व्यक्त). --स्थः {@--1@} A dweller, an inhabitant. {@--2@} A neighbour, countryman. {@--3@} A spy.
